meanings.definition: To surpass in performance or achievement.
meanings.sent1: She always outdoes her classmates in math competitions.
meanings.sent2: The new model of the car outdoes the previous one in fuel efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outdoes the big grasshopper in carrying heavy loads.
meanings.sent4: His dedication outdoes any obstacle in his path.
meanings.sent5: The sun outdoes the moon in brightness.

meanings.definition: To be superior to in action or quality.
meanings.sent1: The talented singer outdoes all others in the competition.
meanings.sent2: Her kindness outdoes her sister's in every situation.
meanings.sent3: The tiny flower outdoes the big tree in attracting butterflies.
meanings.sent4: His determination outdoes his fear of failure.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall outdoes the stream in its majestic beauty.
